DEF.tt: One point of DEF give 1 point of DFP

POW.tt: One point of POW give 2 point of ATP

DEX.tt: One point of DEX give 0.5 point of ATA

MIND.tt: One point of MIND give 2 point of MST

EvolveRare.text: Your Mag is rare and can't no longer evolve

MassFeed.tt: Use the Quantity Column to determine how many of each item it should feed the Mag. If the Quantity of one or many item is 0 these items will not be feed to the Mag.

Monomate.tt: The number of Monomate feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Monomate will be feed.

Dimate.tt: The number of Dimate feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Dimate will be feed.

Trimate.tt: The number of Trimate feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Trimate will be feed.

Monofluid.tt: The number of Monofluid feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Monofluid will be feed.

Difluid.tt: The number of Difluid feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Difluid will be feed.

Trifluid.tt: The number of Trifluid feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Trifluid will be feed.

Antidote.tt: The number of Antidote feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Antidote will be feed.

Antiparalysis.tt: The number of Antiparalysis feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Antiparalysis will be feed.

SolAtomizer.tt: The number of Sol Atomizer feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Sol Atomizer will be feed.

MoonAtomizer.tt: The number of Moon Atomizer feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Moon Atomizer will be feed

StarAtomizer.tt: The number of Star Atomizer feed when the button is pressed, is equal to this number. If the Quantity is 0 then 1 Star Atomizer will be feed
